summary: Life Is a Trumpet has a loose jazz musician as the groom, a butcher as his father, and two families of different backgrounds whose members are not as different as one might expect.
cast: Bojan Navojec|Iva Babic|Mirela Brekalo|Zlatko Vitez|Ksenija Marinkovic|Filip Sovagovic|Goran Navojec|Nikola Barisic|Nika Burdjelez|Bogdan Diklic|Srecko Knezevic|Filip Krizan|Ivan Magud|Ivan Ozegovic|Tara Rosandic|Erna Rudnicki
title: Zivot je truba
